title: The Normal stomach: fluoroscopic observations
creator_credit: Norman Schenker, Association of American Medical Colleges and Medical Audio-Visual Institute
brief_description: Shows by means of cinefluorography, peristalsis, normal tonus, hypertonus, and hypotonus, and the pumping motion of the stomach’s contents.
creator_credit_for_label: Norman Schenker, Association of American Medical Colleges and Medical Audio-Visual Institute
